Source.Author: Allende, L. M., Rubio, I., Ruiz-del-Valle, V., Guillen, J., Martinez-Laso, J., Lowy, E., Varela, P., Zamora, J. and Arnaiz-Villena, A.
Source.Title: The Old World sparrows (genus Passer) phylogeography and their relative abundance of nuclear mtDNA pseudogenes.

SourceTree.Notes: UPGMA dendrogram. Constructed because this type of phylogenetic tree is more suitable for estimating coalescence times than other methods, particularly when a molecular clock exists (as shown in this case by the LINTRE test). Obtained by comparing the mt cyt b DNA sequences of the pheasant and chicken (diverged around 18Ma).
